"Auto Sell Drop Items":
"This is a function which allows you to automatically sell some items when dropped by enemies, based on rules you set.

You can access it by opening the Main Menu, then selecting \"System\"."
"Some items are not eligible to be automatically sold. You can select \"Detailed Information\" to learn which items these are."

"The Auto Sell Drop Items function is only available to you if you have an active Premium Set, or if you have the purchased Auto Sell Usage rights.

Premium Sets can be purchased from the AC Shop, while Auto Sell Usage can be purchased from the SG Shop."
